Server

Class remotePlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • Server.remotePlayer

  • public class remotePlayer
extends java.lang.Object
    remotePlayer is a internal state that contains the vital information about remote players. Is utilized to store transmit data, the specific connection to that player, the players hand and an id.
    Version:
    1
    Author:
    vikfll-0
